```py
>>> rng_tz.floor("2h", ambiguous=False)
DatetimeIndex(['2021-10-31 02:00:00+01:00'],
 dtype='datetime64[ns, Europe/Amsterdam]', freq=None) 
```

```py
>>> rng_tz.floor("2h", ambiguous=True)
DatetimeIndex(['2021-10-31 02:00:00+02:00'],
 dtype='datetime64[ns, Europe/Amsterdam]', freq=None) 
```
